locales.login_new_sub: Let's start by creating a password that will be used to encrypt all of your private data. Make sure it's strong.
locales.login_new_password_plc: Make sure it's a strong password!
locales.login_new_restore_backup_btn: I want to restore from a backup
locales.login_existing_reset_btn: I need to reset my password
locales.login_restore_sub:
If you have a backup for your Scatter you can import it here by loading it into Scatter. 
        You will still need the password to unlock it.
locales.login_restore_back_btn: Go back and start from scratch
locales.dashboard_keys_no_keys: Well, what are we waiting for?
locales.dashboard_apps_no_apps_desc: You can explore apps by searching for various things in the search field above.
locales.dashboard_apps_unlinked_apps_tit: Below are apps that you aren't linked with.
locales.dashboard_apps_unlinked_apps_sub: Note that these apps are not added by the Scatter team, but by the apps themselves. The display of any app is not an endorsement of any kind, just a discovery mechanism.
locales.add_keys_select_disclaimer: Private keys are created locally on your computer and never touch the internet.
locales.add_keys_select_create_desc: If you want to create a new set of keys that you can use on any blockchain. The keys will not have any funds on them, they are brand new.
locales.add_keys_select_import_desc: If you already have a key and want to import it into Scatter
locales.add_keys_select_create_eos_desc: We'll quickly generate two keys for you
locales.add_keys_import_name_plc: Give this key a name to remember.
locales.add_keys_import_text_desc: If you would like to type in or paste your private key
locales.add_keys_import_hw_desc: If you have a supported hardware wallet
locales.add_keys_import_qt_tit: Import private key from a QR code
locales.add_keys_import_qr_desc: If you have an encrypted paper wallet QR code
locales.add_keys_import_text_key_plc: Make sure to enter it correctly
locales.add_keys_import_hw_unlock_ledger_err: You need to unlock your Ledger and open the {x} Ledger App.
locales.add_keys_import_hw_unlock_liq_eos_err: You need to unlock your Liquid EOS hardware wallet.
locales.add_keys_eos_keys_owner_desc: This is your master key which has total control over your account. Do not keep it in Scatter unless you absolutely need it.
locales.add_keys_eos_keys_active_desc: This is the key you will use with applications. It is what you want to keep imported into Scatter.
locales.add_keys_eos_keys_create_eos_acc_tit: Use these keys to create an EOS account.
locales.add_keys_eos_keys_create_eos_acc_desc: You can not instantly use EOS with just keys, you need to create an account with them.
locales.create_eos_disc_tit: Accounts on the EOS blockchain must be paid for to be able to be used.
locales.create_eos_acc_name_len_err: Account name must be 12 characters long.
locales.create_eos_acc_name_form_err: Account name must be lowercase letters only.
locales.create_eos_sel_creator_err: Please select an account creator first.
locales.create_eos_account_acc_lbl: This account will be used to create the account
locales.create_eos_exchange_info_tit: You need to pay for the resources needed to create accounts on the EOS blockchain.
locales.create_eos_exchange_info_sub: All of the extra funds you send will be transferred to the account.
locales.create_eos_exchange_sent_tit: After sending EOS from an exchange with the above details, copy the transaction ID here.
locales.create_eos_exchange_sent_sub: You must wait for the transaction to be irreversible, this takes around 3 minutes.
locales.create_eos_errors_invalid_res: Either CPU or NET was below or equal to 0
locales.keypair_name_plc: Give this key a name to remember.
locales.keypair_dashboard_add_account_create_eos: If you want to create a new EOS account on top of this key.
locales.keypair_dashboard_add_account_link_eos_d: If you already have an EOS account, but it's not being imported automatically.
locales.keypair_dashboard_errors_invalid_wallet_: Enter a name for this key
locales.keypair_dashboard_errors_wallet_name_exi: A key with this name already exists
locales.keypair_tokens_hidden_tokens: {x} tokens filtered out by your token spam filter.
locales.keypair_accounts_eos_danger_perms: Both active and owner are on the same key.
locales.keypair_accounts_eos_danger_perms_sub: Consider changing one to another key by clicking the "Change permissions" button below.
locales.keypair_export_select_key_desc: Export this private key as text
locales.keypair_export_select_qr_desc: Export this private key as an encrypted QR code
locales.identity_disclaimer_tit_imp: Nothing here is required in order to use Scatter
locales.identity_disclaimer_tit: but it might be required by some applications connecting to your Scatter, for instance when using a shopping application that needs your shipping address.
locales.identity_disclaimer_sub: All information is stored locally on your computer and is never sent anywhere without your consent.
locales.identity_name_err: The identity name can not be empty, have any spaces in it, or special characters.
locales.identity_location_disclaimer_sub: For instance "Home" and "Work". You will be able to select which one to use when you need it.
locales.identity_location_name_err: Location names must not be empty.
locales.permissions_rem_id_lbl: Login permissions are what allow applications to interact with your Scatter. You can force a log-out from an application by removing this permission.
locales.permissions_rem_white_lbl: Action whitelists make it so you don't have to keep accepting popups to sign transactions. Do you want to remove this whitelist?
locales.settings_general_white_noti_desc: These notifications appear on certain operating systems when you auto-sign whitelisted transactions.
locales.settings_general_data_path_desc: The location on your computer that Scatter saves its encrypted data to.
locales.settings_general_dev_console_desc: Sometimes you might need to see if Scatter is throwing any errors.
locales.settings_tokens_add_token_disclaimer: Adding tokens will allow you to send them and fetch their balances.
locales.settings_tokens_add_token_tok_name_plc: Name this token or leave empty to use its symbol.
locales.settings_tokens_settings_main_bal_dis_de: You can set whether you want to see balances for all networks in the main dashboard, or just balances for mainnets.
locales.settings_tokens_settings_main_bal_dis_ma: Displaying only mainnet tokens means Scatter will not use alternate chain or testnet chain tokens to calculate total balances.
locales.settings_tokens_settings_main_bal_dis_al: Showing all networks means Scatter will take every network into consideration when calculating total balances.
locales.settings_tokens_settings_filter_small_ba: If you want to always filter out tokens with small balances you can set a modifier here.
locales.settings_tokens_white_black_whitelist_di: Select any token or currency to make it your main display type.
locales.settings_tokens_white_black_blacklist_di: You cannot filter out system tokens for your networks.
locales.settings_pin_desc: Your PIN is a secondary internal password for doing transfers.
locales.settings_pin_desc_red: Do not make your PIN the same as your password!
locales.settings_pin_pin_4_all_desc: If you enable this you will also need to enter your PIN for every popup.
locales.settings_networks_known_add_desc: You can add highly used blockchain networks easily without having to enter their details manually.
locales.settings_networks_custom_cus_sys_tok_des: In some cases you might need to change the system token.
locales.settings_networks_custom_using_cus_sys_t: This network is using a custom token.
locales.settings_password_cng_pass_desc: Every time you change your password you will get a new mnemonic (backup phrase) which is your alternate password for unlocking Scatter.
locales.settings_password_view_mne_desc: If you've lost your password's mnemonic alternative you can view it here.
locales.settings_backup_desc: Backups allow you to save the state of your entire Scatter including all keys, permissions and settings.
locales.settings_firewall_enabled_desc: RIDL Defender is Scatter's proprietary decentralized firewall system. It helps protect you from malicious websites, applications, and accounts.
locales.settings_destroy_desc: Destroying your Scatter will remove all your data including your identities and keypair configurations from your local machine. It will not delete your blockchain accounts from the actual blockchain.
locales.settings_destroy_imp: MAKE SURE YOU HAVE A BACKUP BEFORE YOU DO THIS!
locales.transfer_recipient_verify_recipient: Make sure to check this twice
locales.transfer_recipient_contact_name_lbl: Do you want to add this {x} as a contact?
locales.transfer_errors_invalid_amnt: Invalid amount, must be greater than 0
locales.snackbar_cont_exists: Another contact already has this recipient
locales.snackbar_cont_name_exists: Another contact already has this name
locales.snackbar_network_miss_port: Network must have a valid port
locales.snackbar_network_miss_chain: Network must have a chain id
locales.snackbar_network_chain_exists: A network with this chain id already exists
locales.snackbar_network_name_exists: A network with this name already exists
locales.snackbar_tokens_miss_symbol: You must add a token symbol
locales.snackbar_tokens_miss_contract: You must add a token contract
locales.snackbar_tokens_exists_added: This token already exists in added tokens
locales.snackbar_tokens_exists_filtered: Token already exists in filtered tokens
locales.snackbar_auth_locked_out: You have been locked out temporarily
locales.snackbar_auth_pass_len: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long
locales.snackbar_auth_bad_conf: The confirmation does not match the password
locales.popouts_login_acc_reqs: App requires accounts for these networks
locales.popouts_login_no_accs_tit: You do not have blockchain accounts for the networks that this application requires.
locales.popouts_login_no_accs_desc: Before logging into this application go back to Scatter and import some keys for the network/blockchain that this application is using.
locales.popouts_login_miss_fields_desc: Fill out the inputs below which will add those fields to your identity for later use and also return them to the application.
locales.popouts_link_app_disclaimer: Make sure the application name is an application you are interacting with right now.
locales.popouts_signature_arb_dis_desc: To protect you we have disabled the ability to sign arbitrary data that is longer than 12 characters per word.
locales.popouts_signature_whitelist_desc: Whitelist this to not have to accept next time
locales.popins_fullscreen_check_hardware_desc: You should see a confirmation on your hardware device.
locales.popins_fullscreen_destroy_disc: Before doing this, make sure you have all of your private keys backed up.
locales.popins_fullscreen_destroy_desc: Destroying your Scatter is irreversible, and you will not be able to restore any data without backups.
locales.popins_fullscreen_whitelisting_desc: Whitelisting actions makes it so you don't have to keep approving actions for applications you trust. When whitelisting actions you will see checkboxes appear next to each action and value.
locales.popins_fullscreen_whitelisting_mutable_p: this value will be able to change without a popup
locales.popins_fullscreen_whitelisting_immutable: if this changes you will have to approve the action again
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_change_perms_desc: Changing your account's permissions means changing the keys that power the account.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_change_perms_sub_d: You can leave either field blank to keep the existing permission.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_change_perms_key_p: Enter a public key or account name
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_mod_cpunet_stake_d: Self staking CPU & NET will allow this account to do more on the blockchain.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_mod_cpunet_unstake: Unstaking CPU & NET will reclaim tokens, but will let you do less.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_mod_ram_buy_desc: Buying RAM will let this account hold more data on the blockchain.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_mod_ram_sell_desc: Selling RAM reclaims token to that account at the current price of RAM.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_proxy_repro_tit: Do you want to automatically re-proxy every 7 days?
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_proxy_repro_desc: If you enable this, accepting the initial transaction also accepts all future transactions too.
locales.popins_fullscreen_eos_proxy_plc: Enter the account name of a proxy
locales.popins_fullscreen_mnemonic_desc: This phrase is a backup for your password. It is not used to generate keys.
locales.popins_fullscreen_mnemonic_sub_desc: You can paste this phrase into any field that accepts a password in Scatter.
locales.popins_fullscreen_remove_key_disc: Removing keys also removes all of its accounts and their application permissions.
locales.popins_fullscreen_unlink_account_desc: Removing a linked account also removes all of its application permissions
locales.popins_fullscreen_unlink_account_sub_des: Select all the authorities you want to remove.
locales.popins_fullscreen_unlink_blockchain_disc: Unlinking a blockchain also removes all of its accounts and their application permissions.
locales.popins_overlay_remove_app_desc: You are about to remove this application from your Scatter. This will also remove all whitelist permissions.
locales.popins_overlay_trx_success_desc: Click link below to view on {x}
locales.popins_overlay_update_avail_click_link: Click the link below to go to the downloads page
